Payroll_Payee_Estimated_Annual_Lump_Sum_.description: Enter Quebec for QC Estimated Lump Sum election. Otherwise blank for Federal and other provinces.

Enter the amount of the Annual Lump Sum Wages for the worker to be used for the Lump Sum tax calculation to indicate that multiple lump sum payments are planned in the year to ensure the correct lump sum tax is applied to all payments.

description: Payroll Payee Estimated Annual Lump Sum Data

validation.validation: Worker has no Position within this company. Tax Elections can only be created for Companies for which the Worker has a Position.
Province reference can only be Quebec if the Election is for Quebec or blank for all other Provinces.
Estimated Annual Lump Sum Wages is required and cannot be 0.0.
You can't change the worker for an existing tax election. Either create a new tax election or use the current worker for this tax election.
You can't change the company for an existing tax election. Either create a new tax election or use the current company for this tax election.
You can't change the Effective As Of date for an existing tax election. Either create a new tax election or use the current Effective As Of date for this tax election.
